parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> TKOH

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> RTD

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.00
</value></part><part><name> game2</name>=<value> arma 3
</value></part><part><name>version2</name>=<value>1.34

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Instantly set a helicopter's engine RPMs to the given value.
* engine index 0: engine #1
* engine index 1: engine #2
* engine index 2: engine #3
* engine index -1: all engines 
<template lineStart="1"><title>Feature</title><part><name index="1"/><value>afm</value></part></template>

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> helicopterRTD '''setEngineRPMRTD''' [value, engineIndex]

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> helicopterRTD: [[ObjectRTD]] - helicopter
</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> value: [[Number]] - desired RPMs
</value></part><part><name>p3</name>=<value> engineIndex: [[Number]] - engine index

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Nothing]]

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>(vehicle player) setEngineRPMRTD [6500, -1];</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[setWantedRPMRTD]]
</value></part></template>

<template lineStart="1"><title>GameCategory</title><part><name index="1"/><value>tkoh</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>Scripting Commands</value></part></template></root>
